name: Cat-Astrophe Alpha Demo
description:
In another reality, where cats stand on two legs and fight each other with fish, brave cats can take the ultimate challenge: the endless cat tower. Take up your fish and inhale some catnip as you prepare to make a name for yourself. How far can you go?

This is an early Alpha prototype of Cat-Astrophe, and will have a few more updates as the Kickstarter continues and after it - find the Kickstarter here: https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/notevilstudios/cat-astrophe


Default controls:

Movement - WASD/Arrow Keys

Camera - Mouse Movement

Attack - Left Mouse

Parry - Right Mouse

Tactical Item Prepare - E

Tactical Item Use - Left Mouse

Jump - Space

Next Weapon - Q

Pause - Escape

Tactical Item Switch - R
